mapper.select: select practice_id, stu.name as stuName, status, createtime, sp.score, p.name as programme, c.name as course from zyyj_programme as p, zyyj_student_practice as sp, zyyj_student as stu, zyyj_course as c where p.programme_id=sp.programme_id and stu.stu_id=sp.stu_id and c.course_id=sp.course_id;

SELECT practice_id, stu.name as stuName, status, createtime, sp.score, p.name as programme, c.name as course FROM zyyj_programme as p, zyyj_student_practice as sp, zyyj_student as stu, zyyj_course as c WHERE p.programme_id=sp.programme_id and stu.stu_id=sp.stu_id and c.course_id=sp.course_id and stu.name like #{input};
